TopicTitle: Anyone having issues with MechJeb and the LazorSystem?

Articles.Content:
I have both MechJeb and the LazorSystem mods, but the Mechjeb Tab is sitting right on top of the Lazorsystem tab, making it impossible to use the Lazorsystem. I cant close the Lazersystem, or access the panels that Mechjeb is covering. It used to be that the Mechjeb Tab slides up and down the right side - but it wont move?

Anyone else have this issue with the Mechjeb tab? Is is supposed to move?
You can move the lazor system tab once you open up the tab, it can be moved. I don't think it saves where you place it, though.
The problem is the mechjeb tab covers the lazer tab, and i cant click on it
